# About this site

This website is the official site for the project, *Analysis of Time-varying Brain Dynamics and Cognitive Correlates*. The project is led by [Professor Seonjoo Lee](https://sites.google.com/site/seonjool/) from Columbia University. Yiling Yang, a 2nd year MS Biostatistics student also from Columbia University, performed the major analysis. Their contact information can be found at the end of this page. The website is for introduction of the project and make code and slides open sources to those who are interested in this topic.

# Data

There are three datasets involved in this projects.

<dl>
  <dt>Functional fMRI data</dt>
    <dd>- 477 healthy subjects collected using Shen Atlas</dd>
    <dd>- Two possible studying length: 285 or 150</dd>
    <dd>- Neuropsychological score</dd>
  <dt>Neuropsychological score</dt>
    <dd>
  
      - Acquired before fMRI data acquisition.
      <dl>
  	 	 <dt>1. Memory: Selective Reminding Task (SRT)</dt>
		    <dt>2. Reasoning (WAIS III)</dt>
		      <dd>- Block Design Test</dd>
		      <dd>- Letter-Number Sequencing Test</dd>
		      <dd>- Matrix Reasoning test</dd>
		    <dt>3. Speed Attention</dt>
		      <dd>- The Digit Symbol subtest (WAIS III)</dd>
			    <dd>- Part A of the Trail Making Test</dd>
			    <dd>- Number of colored ink patches in the Stroop color naming test</dd>
		    <dt>4. Vocabulary</dt>
		      <dd>- Wechsler Test of Adult Reading (WAIS III)</dd>
			    <dd>- American National Adult Reading Test (AMNART)</dd>
		    <dt>5. IQ</dt> 
		  </dl>
    </dd>
  <dt>Demographic data</dt>
    <dd>- Acquired before fMRI data acquisition</dd>
</dl>
